tagline: Match collector cards with auction items based on shared descriptions to earn value!
itemManagementDesc: Browse, view, and manage auction items with detailed descriptions and values.
collectorCardsDesc: Create and manage collector cards with unique descriptions and values.
matchingSystemDesc: Match items with collectors to earn values based on matching descriptions.
step1: Each person creates two collector items with unique descriptions and values.
step2: The auctioneer presents one item at a time to all collectors.
step3: If a collector item matches descriptions with the presented item, each matching description adds to the money given.
step4: For example: If an item matches "Like postmodernism products" (21w) and "Like transportation" (13w), the collector gets 21+13=34w.
step5: The items and collector cards are matched by ID to ensure proper tracking.
copyright: Copyright Â© {{year}} Auction-Collector Matching System. All rights reserved.
uploadError: Please fill all {{type}} fields and select an image
auctionDescription: Select items to find matching collectors based on descriptions
noItemsFound: No items found matching your search
noCollectorsFound: No collectors found matching your search
illustrationItemDescription: An illustration item depicting artistic elements with detailed craftsmanship. These items are highly valued by illustration collectors.
sculptureItemDescription: A sculptural piece showcasing three-dimensional artistry. These items are particularly sought after by sculpture enthusiasts.
productItemDescription: A manufactured product with practical applications. These items are especially valuable to product collectors.
unknownItemDescription: A mysterious item with unknown origins.
illustrationCollectorDescription: An enthusiast of illustrated works, particularly valuing artistic masterpieces. This collector specializes in acquiring and preserving illustrations of significant cultural or historical importance.
sculptureCollectorDescription: A connoisseur of sculptural art forms, focusing on three-dimensional works. This collector values the physical presence and spatial relationships created by sculptural pieces.
productCollectorDescription: A product collector with an eye for manufactured items of practical use. This collector appreciates innovative design and functionality in everyday objects.
unknownCollectorDescription: A collector with varied interests across multiple domains.
customizationDescription: Customize titles and descriptions for your cards
selectCardPrompt: Please select a card from the list to customize its title and description.
